Uses of Interface
org.opengis.referencing.cs.AffineCS

Packages that use AffineCS
Package
Description
org.apache.sis.referencing.cs
Coordinate System (CS) definitions as the set of coordinate system axes that spans the coordinate space.
org.apache.sis.referencing.factory
Creates Coordinate Reference System (CRS) objects from given properties or authority codes.
org.opengis.referencing.crs
Coordinate reference systems (coordinate systems with a datum).
org.opengis.referencing.cs
Coordinate systems and their axis.

    Classes in org.apache.sis.referencing.cs that implement AffineCS
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    DefaultAffineCS
    A 2- or 3-dimensional coordinate system with straight axes that are not necessarily orthogonal.
    class 
    DefaultCartesianCS
    A 2- or 3-dimensional Cartesian coordinate system made of straight orthogonal axes.
